properties.name: adSize
properties.description: Banner Ad Size, defaults to `SMART_BANNER`. IT can be: `SMART_BANNER`, `BANNER`, `MEDIUM_RECTANGLE`, `FULL_BANNER`, `LEADERBOARD`, `SKYSCRAPER`, or `CUSTOM`

properties.name: width
properties.description: Banner width, valid when `adSize` is set to `CUSTOM`

properties.name: height
properties.description: Banner height, valid when `adSize` is set to `CUSTOM`

properties.name: overlap
properties.description: Allow banner to overlap webview, or else it will push webview up or down to avoid overlap. Defaults to false.

properties.name: position
properties.description: Position of banner ad. Defaults to `TOP_CENTER`. You can use the `AdMob.AD_POSITION` property to select other values.

properties.name: x
properties.description: X in pixels. Valid when `position` is set to `POS_XY`

properties.name: y
properties.description: Y in pixels. Valid when `position` is set to `POS_XY`

properties.name: isTesting
properties.description: Set to true to receive test ad for testing purposes

properties.name: autoShow
properties.description: Auto show interstitial ad when loaded. Set to false if hope to control the show timing with prepareInterstitial/showInterstitial

properties.name: orientationRenew
properties.description: Re-create the banner on web view orientation change (not screen orientation), or else just move the banner. Default:true.

properties.name: adExtras
properties.description: Set extra color style for Ad
